name: TheMotivationalMoment
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to a quick dose of love, laughter, and thought-provoking upliftment in this daily motivational moment! 

Based on the writings of Jennifer Bridgeforth - a serial entrepreneur, coach, and highly sought after motivational speaker. She’s the founder and president of JBE/The Phoenix Group - a leadership and empowerment consultancy that works with individuals and businesses on discovering and building their personal voice.

Jennifer is the creator of the “Ask Jennifer B” series, which focuses on audience-based questions and advice to help everyday people make extraordinary changes to their personal lives. She also is the host of the new "The Motivational Moment" podcast.

In 2013, She wrote her first book titled “Wisdom In Pieces” that included over 135 affirmations and inspirational stories that could be read in 2 minutes or less. The second edition was released in September of 2017 and immediately became an Amazon Best Seller.

Jennifer is a relatable, honest expert on human behavior, wellness, and inspiration. She is also a domestic violence and breast cancer survivor who uses her own personal story of facing obstacles as inspiration to living beyond your challenges.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
